attributes.name: rad-text
attributes.description: You can bind rad text, so combo box will show binded data instead of loading data, until user opens it.

attributes.name: rad-datasource
attributes.description: Bind this to kendo data source you've in view model.

attributes.name: rad-value-field-name
attributes.description: Property of dto to be assigned into ng-model when user selects.

attributes.name: rad-text-field-name
attributes.description: Property of dto to be displayed to user. It can be overrided using item-template. Note that this field will be used for filtering when user searchs in combo box.

attributes.name: rad-virtual-entity-loader
attributes.description: Bind this to a method which accepts args : { id : any } to enable Data|UI virtualiztion whenever you've large sets of data. At that function you should return a promise, which resolves into an entity with that id.

attributes.name: rad-on-init
attributes.description: Bind this to a method which accepts args : { comboBoxOptions: comboBoxOptions }. You can customize all aspects of your combo box there.

attributes.name: k-placeholder
attributes.description: The hint displayed by the widget when it is empty.

attributes.name: k-min-length
attributes.description: The minimum number of characters the user must type before a search is performed. Set to higher value than 1 if the search could match a lot of items.

attributes.name: k-clear-button
attributes.description: Unless this options is set to false, a button will appear when hovering the widget.

attributes.name: k-enable
attributes.description: If set to false the widget will be disabled and will not allow user input.

attributes.name: k-filter
attributes.description: The filtering method used to determine the suggestions for the current value.

attributes.name: k-ignore-case
attributes.description: If set to false case-sensitive search will be performed to find suggestions. The widget performs case-insensitive searching by default.

attributes.name: rad-datasource
attributes.description: Bind this to kendo data source you've in view model.

attributes.name: rad-on-init
attributes.description: Bind this to a method which accepts args : { gridOptions: gridOptions }. You can customize all aspects of your data grid there.

attributes.name: k-navigatable
attributes.description: If set to true the use could navigate the widget using the keyboard navigation.

attributes.name: k-reorderable
attributes.description: If set to true the user could reorder the columns by dragging their header cells. Multi-level headers allow reordering only in same level.

attributes.name: k-resizable
attributes.description: If set to true, users can resize columns by dragging the edges (resize handles) of their header cells. Users can also auto-fit a column by double-clicking its resize handle. In this case the column will assume the smallest possible width, which allows the column content to fit without wrapping.

attributes.name: k-sortable
attributes.description: If set to true the user could sort the grid by clicking the column header cells.

name: ng-outlet
description: The directive that identifies where the Router should render its Components.

attributes.name: ng-link
attributes.description: Title for binding a clickable HTML element to a route, via a Link Parameters Array.

name: persian-date-picker
description: This Date picker work with solar based calendar. It accepts ng-model. To configure date or date/time see is-date-time attribute.

attributes.name: is-date-time
attributes.description: Show/accept date or date time. default: false >> date only.

name: dto-form
description: Use dto-form instead of ng-form when you're working wit dto. It requires ng-model. <dto-form name='customerForm' ng-model='...'></dto-form>

name: error-messages
description:
Shows errors to user.
Last name is required

attributes.name: field
attributes.description: Set this to formName.fieldName you're going to show its errors. for example customerForm.LastName

name: element-mover
description: Set element-selector and predicate. Whenever predicate resolves into true, it will move element into this element-mover

attributes.name: predicate
attributes.description: For example vm.x == true

attributes.name: element-selector
attributes.description: For example #someElement

name: md-button
description: <md-button> is a button directive with optional ink ripples (default enabled). If you supply a href or ng-href attribute, it will become an <a> element. Otherwise, it will become a <button> element.

attributes.name: md-no-ink
attributes.description: If present, disable ripple ink effects.

attributes.name: md-ripple-size
attributes.description: Overrides the default ripple size logic.
